Miscellaneous Highlights: South Africa will take on Bangladesh in the 21st T20I of T20 World Cup 2024 on 10th June, at the Nassau County International Cricket Stadium, New York.
The Netherlands clashed with South Africa in Match 16, setting the stage for an exhilarating showdown.
Sri Lanka squared off against Bangladesh in Match 15, igniting a blaze of anticipation among cricket aficionados.
The pitch is batting-friendly and best suited for spin, with an average first-inning score of 165 and a winning percentage of 60% for the chasing team.
The weather forecast is partly cloudy, with a temperature of 26°c, humidity of 46%, and a 20% chance of rain.

The probable playing XIs for South Africa include Heinrich Klaasen, Quinton de Kock, Reeza Hendricks, David Miller, Tristan Stubbs, Aiden Markram, Marco Jansen, Ottaneil Baartman, Keshav Maharaj, Anrich Nortje, and Kagiso Rabada.

The probable playing XIs for Bangladesh include Tanzid Hasan, Soumya Sarkar, Litton Das, Najmul Hossain Shanto, Shakib Al Hasan, Towhid Hridoy, Mahmudullah, Rishad Hossain, Tanzim Hasan Shakib, Hasan Mahmud, and Mustafizur Rahman.
